main event: On 22 September 1958, a civilian reported observing a bright white object with alternating red light larger than an aircraft, which jumped back and forth in the sky for 3 minutes.
interesting points: The UFO emitted a very bright light and was larger than an aircraft., The object exhibited maneuverability by jumping back and forth., The sighting occurred under cloudy conditions with light rain present., The observer was a 33-year-old housewife., The object was reported to have faded away after the observation.
sighted object: a bright white object with alternating red light
